comment.body: May 2019 be less of a pile of shit than 2018 was! And may the rest of your 2019 be pleasant.

So does that make you cool kids? Ha ha ha.
What's the story with hubs and profiles on hubs? Is everything shared between them? Do I just sign up with one and when I visit another it will add to what I see? You have a hub and you're always being helpful so I hope this is a good place to ask :)
@Pexo: Thanks a lot! Very clear and informative. :)
